name: Mutiny
headline: Uses AI and data to convert website visitors into customers
description:
Today companies spend over $1T to bring customers to the door, but $19 of every $20 they spend does not convert to revenue. Companies have no choice other than to dedicate large engineering and data science teams to manually build more relevant, higher converting experiences for different customer segments.

Mutiny is a no-code AI platform that helps marketers convert their top of funnel demand into revenue, without engineers. Mutiny gives marketers everything they need to drive revenue and prove it — from data and analytics to AI-powered recommendations and content writing. We are backed by Sequoia Capital, Tiger Global, Insight Partners, Y Combinator and CMOs from some of today’s fastest-growing tech companies including AngelList, Carta, Gong, Salesforce and Snowflake.

###### INTRODUCING 1:1 GTM
## B2B Marketers have 2 bad options to break into target accounts
Option 1: Manually create highly personalized assets. Sales loves it, but it doesn’t scale. 
Option 2: Create 1:many generic campaigns. It scales, but sales doesn’t care and it doesn't work.
You've had things that worked and you've had things that scaled. But it's never been possible to have both, until now with 1:1 GTM.
Mutiny is on a mission to make 1:1 GTM possible.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%272000%27%20height=%271358%27/%3e)![Descrition of 1:1 GTM](https://www.mutinyhq.com)
## Mutiny helps you activate, convert, and understand your target accounts with 1:1 GTM
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2740%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![Break into every target account.svg](https://www.mutinyhq.com)
## Activate 1:1 scalable campaigns
The best way to generate pipeline from your target accounts is with personalized pages. Finally, you can do that at scale.
[![Read how Snowflake uses 1:1 GTM to drive 150% more pipeline](https://images.ctfassets.net/iyugl3c8guv8/7fypZfLGw9YGwXJftxDbMn/ef92ed3ef54e6f180007e47b2baa06ae/activate-testimony.png)](https://www.mutinyhq.com/</playbooks/snowflake-dynamic-personalization>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27800%27%20height=%27667%27/%3e)![Mutiny Visual Website Editor](https://www.mutinyhq.com)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2740%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![Accelerate deal velocity.svg](https://www.mutinyhq.com)
## Collaborate with sales to convert target accounts
Help your sellers convert engaged contacts and accounts into pipeline with real time signals and personalized assets at their fingertips.
[![See how Attentive SDRs use Mutiny to identify the right contact, at the right time, with the right messaging](https://images.ctfassets.net/iyugl3c8guv8/2LErd2f2pf2eyBW4ZriTeY/7cbc9430018209500a0a29e9afc62179/convert-testimony.png)](https://www.mutinyhq.com/</blog/mutiny-for-sales>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27800%27%20height=%27533%27/%3e)![Sales Integration](https://www.mutinyhq.com)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2740%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![Drive upsell and expansion.svg](https://www.mutinyhq.com)
## Show the impact of ABM for every account
Understand how every sales and marketing activity drives target account engagement and pipeline impact, all in one place. 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27800%27%20height=%27533%27/%3e)![ABM landing pages](https://www.mutinyhq.com)
## Want to see real examples?
Study our library of successful playbooks, all written by marketers using Mutiny. 
(No email required)

Browse real customer examples⟨10⟩
###### INTRODUCING 1:1 GTM
## B2B Marketers have 2 bad options to break into target accounts
Option 1: Manually create highly personalized assets. Sales loves it, but it doesn’t scale. 
Option 2: Create 1:many generic campaigns. It scales, but sales doesn’t care and it doesn't work.
You've had things that worked and you've had things that scaled. But it's never been possible to have both, until now with 1:1 GTM.
Mutiny is on a mission to make 1:1 GTM possible.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%272000%27%20height=%271358%27/%3e)![Descrition of 1:1 GTM⟨30⟩]
## Mutiny helps you activate, convert, and understand your target accounts with 1:1 GTM
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2740%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![Break into every target account.svg⟨30⟩]
## Activate 1:1 scalable campaigns
The best way to generate pipeline from your target accounts is with personalized pages. Finally, you can do that at scale.
![Read how Snowflake uses 1:1 GTM to drive 150% more pipeline⟨31⟩](https://www.mutinyhq.com/</playbooks/snowflake-dynamic-personalization>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27800%27%20height=%27667%27/%3e)![Mutiny Visual Website Editor⟨30⟩]
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2740%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![Accelerate deal velocity.svg⟨30⟩]
## Collaborate with sales to convert target accounts
Help your sellers convert engaged contacts and accounts into pipeline with real time signals and personalized assets at their fingertips.
![See how Attentive SDRs use Mutiny to identify the right contact, at the right time, with the right messaging⟨32⟩](https://www.mutinyhq.com/</blog/mutiny-for-sales>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27800%27%20height=%27533%27/%3e)![Sales Integration⟨30⟩]
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2740%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![Drive upsell and expansion.svg⟨30⟩]
## Show the impact of ABM for every account
Understand how every sales and marketing activity drives target account engagement and pipeline impact, all in one place. 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27800%27%20height=%27533%27/%3e)![ABM landing pages⟨30⟩]
## Want to see real examples?
Study our library of successful playbooks, all written by marketers using Mutiny. 
(No email required)
Browse real customer examples⟨10⟩

generated_description:
### Mutiny Overview

**Company Name:** Mutiny  
**Founded:** 2018 (Y Combinator Batch S18)  
**Location:** San Francisco, California  
**Employees:** 81  
**Funding:** Backed by prominent investors including Sequoia Capital, Tiger Global, Insight Partners, and Y Combinator.  

**Mission:**  
Mutiny aims to tackle a significant problem in the B2B landscape: while companies annually spend over $1 trillion to drive traffic, a staggering $950 billion (or $19 out of every $20) fails to convert into revenue. Mutiny’s goal is to optimize conversion rates using AI and data, effectively turning visitors into customers without the need for extensive engineering resources.

### What They Do

Mutiny offers a no-code AI platform that empowers marketers. Key features include:

- **1:1 Go-To-Market (GTM) Experiences:** 
  - Enables personalized campaigns at scale, allowing targeted marketing that resonates with specific customer segments.
  
- **Microsites:** 
  - Users can create and deploy tailored outbound landing pages quickly, ensuring that marketing efforts can respond dynamically to target accounts.
  
- **Account Intelligence:** 
  - By tracking and analyzing engagements on the company’s website, Mutiny provides insights about target accounts, enhancing decision-making and personalization.

- **Integrations:** 
  - The platform easily integrates into existing sales and marketing tech stacks, making it a flexible choice for companies looking to enhance their marketing automation.

### Additional Offerings

Mutiny is not just a tool but a resource center. Here's what you can find:

- **Playbooks and Case Studies:** 
  - Real-life examples and lessons from top marketers using the platform to achieve significant outcomes.
  
- **Resource Hub:** 
  - Educational materials to help marketers achieve pipeline goals and refine their strategies.

- **Community Engagement:** 
  - Mutiny facilitates a community where ambitious marketers can share ideas and best practices.

### Summary

In essence, Mutiny revolutionizes the way B2B companies convert traffic into revenue, offering a platform that democratizes personalization. It’s all about using data smartly to create experiences that work. By minimizing the need for heavy engineering involvement, Mutiny allows marketing teams to take charge and drive conversions effectively.

For a deeper dive, check out Mutiny’s offerings [here](https://www.mutinyhq.com).
